message: Let's start with a fair but slightly uneven split. I'm happy to take a bigger share this round, but I'm open to negotiating a more even split in future rounds if you're willing to accept my offer.
Alice, your offer was quite bold! How about we go with a 60/40 split in my favor this time? Consider it a counter-offer. We can always aim for a more balanced approach in later rounds.
I appreciate your counter-offer, but I'm still looking for a more balanced split. Let's try 55/45 this time.  If we keep rejecting each other, we'll both end up with nothing!
Alice, let's stop wasting time and both lose because of inflation!  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Take it, and we both win!
